pageTitle: Itinerary for Thursday, October 13, 2016 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Itinerary for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Thursday, October 13, 2016:

Ottawa, Ontario

8:15 a.m. The Prime Minister will greet His Excellency Manuel Valls, Prime Minister of the French Republic.

Peace Tower Entrance, Centre Block
Parliament Hill          

Note for media:

  • Open coverage


8:30 a.m. The Prime Minister will attend the Welcoming Ceremony for His Excellency Manuel Valls, Prime Minister of the French Republic.

Confederation Hall (Rotunda), Centre Block
Parliament Hill

Note for media:

  • Open coverage


8:40 a.m. The Prime Minister will participate in a wreath-laying ceremony.

The Memorial Chamber, Peace Tower, Centre Block
Parliament Hill

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity


8:50 a.m. The Prime Minister will hold a bilateral meeting with His Excellency Manuel Valls, Prime Minister of the French Republic.

Office of the Prime Minister, Centre Block
Parliament Hill

Note for media:

  • Pooled Photo Opportunity at the beginning of the meeting


9:00 a.m. The Prime Minister will hold an expanded bilateral meeting with His Excellency Manuel Valls, Prime Minister of the French Republic.

Office of the Prime Minister, Centre Block
Parliament Hill

Note for media:

  • Pooled Photo Opportunity at the beginning of the meeting


9:30 a.m. The Prime Minister will hold a joint media availability with His Excellency Manuel Valls, Prime Minister of the French Republic.

House of Commons Foyer, Centre Block
Parliament Hill

Note for media:

  • Open coverage


Montréal, Québec

12:35 p.m. The Prime Minister will participate in a roundtable meeting on CETA, with Premier Philippe Couillard and His Excellency Manuel Valls, Prime Minister of the French Republic.

Basement, Room A/B/C
Le Centre Sheraton Hotel
1201 Boulevard René-Lévesque W

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity at the beginning of the meeting
  • Media should arrive no later than 11:45 a.m. (Room 8)


1:20 p.m. The Prime Minister will participate in an armchair discussion with Premier Philippe Couillard and His Excellency Manuel Valls, Prime Minister of the French Republic at an economic business luncheon hosted by the Montréal Chamber of Commerce.

4th Floor, Grand Ballroom
Le Centre Sheraton Hotel
1201 Boulevard René-Lévesque W

Note for media:

  • Open coverage


PMO Media Relations:
media@pmo-cpm.gc.ca
613-957-5555
